text: magen aathata ...
ihatha hethuwa nisawen swadhinawa sitimata uthsaha darannawu ho wenath deshapalana mathayak daranna wu ho aduran hata athi pawathma krama kramayen ahosi wi yayi.
math trayi karala balanna ooni.. :7
aawaranaya karana lada badu madiriya (bogi)
mehi uchchatha ma awasthawa daknata labune prabhakaran sadhakaya nandikadal kalapuwen awasan kala mohothe ya.
mese diwya pujawa pawathwagena yana atharathura kapakirima awasan wanawath samangama ekawarama midiyusha rudhiraya bawata path wiya.
owun pasuda ude paththara kanthoru walata gos eeye ra sunil ayiya kiya dipu dewal hariyatama thaman kiyawa labu danuma wage sessanta kiyannata wiya.
pare yannath hamba wenne na.
anna ee welawe thamayi me githaya mata mathak wune.
kisi kalekath ma samananan hara ragayen peralunawu sith athiwa para purushayan muhuna nobalimi.
kirimata patan gathimi.
eyin passe tika kalayak yaddi jiwitheta thawa kenek ekathu une matath nodanimayi...

agamathithumata wishwasaya palakirime yojanawak bawata pariwarthanaya wi hamarayi.
eyin wahanaya wana dugandata iha mola da kakiyawanneya.
apa laba dunne praja polis puhunuwak - skotlantha polisiya
lunu rasak nathi premaya...
namuth suwaya labu pasuwa nawathath rogaya uthsanna wimak athi wana thek mema rogin kisidu roga lakshanayak nomathiwa ho sulu washayen roga lakshana penwiya hakiya.

" mahaththayo...keli iskole ahawara wela awilla wawe mal kadanna yanawa....hungak dawas wala...eewa dematamal pansala langa wikunala thamayi poth path ganne....iskole yanna....mama leda duka newa....kiyak hari ithuru karala gedara oona epakam walatath denawa....."
madayi math magulgedarann ahitiya ‚Ä¶..
sthuthiyi nage meka damma eka gana ee wagema duk wedana windina apema soyuriyan kalakage wedanawata sanwedi unu oyage hithata mage acharaya . . .
‚Äúmama kathuraka kotasak thabagena hondata muwahath karala gedarama thanaka hangala thibba.
ape ingirisi sar.
ee wana wita jathika rupawahiniya aarambha kara no thibu nisa eya wikashaya kerune ewakata thibu ekama nalikawa wu swadhina rupawahiniya maginuyi.
the saha obe bandima arambaenne kothaninda...

manapa chunda ka‡∑äramaya namathi uwaduren nidahas wima sandaha mathiwarana kottasha sima nirnayak sema wyawasthamaya pa‡∑ärathisanskaranath athyawashya bawa piliganna atharama, esema, maitha‡∑äripala sirisenage yahapalana pa‡∑ärakashanaye eya ek poronduwak washayen pawathi bawath piliganna atharama, kuda saha sulu jathika paksha idiripath karana sakasanka ganath nisi awadhanaya waha yomu kala yuthuwa thibe.
aadareyi man aadareyi, maya pansala, sutin matin, prema dadayama miltan handa kawu nirmana athara we.
thoga kala durakathana aluthwadiya amathara kotas ha aadeshana thira - agawinisuru ilektronika upakarana
eeka thamayi hamoma handunaganna ekama jathyanthara nithiya.
aayeth hambenawa nam, yanawada?
doshayak reporthu kirimata.
nangigeth aasawa nisa banapu nathi eka hodayi..
eya mata kamaththen unne.

yakada wikinima ha sewakayakuta paharadima athulu chodanawalata lakwa sitina kuda thewathu sanwardhana adhikariye sabhapathi wijerathna dewagedara mahatha ge madihathwimen me niladharin aniwarya niwadu yawa athi bawa ehi abhyanthara aaranchi margawalin wartha we.
me minissunta wen kale koti 175yi.
ehema hithadara mithuran aththe ma nathiwa nowe.
onna magenuth his ahasata unusum suba pathum .....
nepalayen wartha wu marana sankhyawa siyayakata adhikayi.
mejar jenaral chagi wahama iwath karanna -sambandhan,maithrita upades dila
" ara ape ayiya karaya awillane rata indala.."

pilithura:- ee margaya thamayi prathamayen prajathanthra wirodhi lesa ithama hithuwakkari lesa thunen dekaka balayak pawichchi karamin ratata ahithakara, rate jathika aarthikayata ahithakara anapanath rashiyak sammatha karagaththa.
pawasuwe mahinda rajapaksha ema giwisum athsan karana ladde chundaya dina ganima sandaha karana upaka‡∑äramayak washayen pamanak bawayi.
owun bhagyawathun wahanseta pera gaman kota, ek ayek bhagyawathun wahansege pathra siwuru piligaththa.
owun asalin yana shishyawakagen ayage nama wimasa soyagath bawath aya noditiya.
dan prashnaya thibenne udghoshakayanta mema kiri pakat beduwe ejapaya yayi kima ganaya.
bohoma sthuthiyi sudika ayiya.
dahawal 12.30 pamana wana wita polis niladhari mahathaku wisin apagen kotasak shalawakata athul kaleya.

sap 19, 2014 (wimasuma) ‚Äì china janapathige shi‡∑ära lanka sancharayath samanga megawot 900ka mulu dharithawen yuth norachchola gal anguru balagaraya bala ganwamin janapathi mahinda rajapaksha siyalu widuli paribhogikayange widuli bil path walin siyayata wisi pahak adu karana baw pa‡∑ärakasha kaleya.
ape rate watina jiwitha rasak maru thurulata kandawu dengu maduru wasangathaya thuran karannata parisara hithakami swabhawika kramawedayak yoda‚Ä¶
ehenam aayeth hondata praktis karanna gamu.
eya labune aprel dakwa pamanayi.
ee asse ee sewanallata heththuwi ara sewanalle aakarayata adala nowana wenath sewanali athnam, emenma eewa warinwara peni nopeni yanne nam.
ange halagaththe nadda?

hama dinakama apa aluth chithrapata wenuwen winadi 15 k wen kara chithrapataye wisthara, githa rupa ramu kipayak, samanga chithrapataya penwana sthana, eewa patan ganna welawan, athuluwa chithrapatawala pracharathmaka wadasatahanak rajaya mulika wi ema rupawahini nalikawala pracharaya karanne nam ema paniwidaya prekshakayan atharata wistharathmakawa yawenu atha.
buddhaghosha himiyanta anuwa kalaya yanu panynyaththiyak pamanaki.
tikak withara nahaya karadara kalata mokada angata maha wada dena ledak nemene.ane mata baninnepa hembirissawa honda kalata.

shri lankawa pilibanda parikshana warthawa idiripath kirima eksath jathinge manawa himikam komisama kaldama thibima balawath mulawak athi kara athayi prakasha karana ratin bahara demala eelam rajaye agramathya wi.rudrakumaran, marthu masa eksath jathinge manawa himikam sasiwarayata wachika warthawak idiripath karana lesa manawa himikam komasariswarayagen illimak kara atha.
api me kiyanna yanne thawath ahunu ehema kathawak gana.
kimidumkaruwan athe mapiyanta lipi yawimata daruwan saha sahaya puhunukaruta awasthawa labuni.
"hodayi daruwa api ehenam hadi gawila yannama gurukamak karamu."
manomaya kayika dewiyan oopapathikawa upadina bawa kiya thibe.
una/ rogaya waladi thewana dina ho eyata prathama pahatha sandahan awadanam roga lakshana pennum karana rogin
nikan hinawenna bari da?‚Äú
gud mornin aanti‚Ä¶
ee sandaha thakshanaya, wisheshayen sanniwedana thakshanaya, awashya ya.
fes buk, wats ap, wayibar pamanak awahira kirima.
dahaduk winde daruwo hadannayi dahaduk winde man // karadandu uswi ee daruwange mawpiyo ada handunanne nane dahaduk winde ...
pruthiwiye athi jalayen 97% k lawana jalaya yi.
ee aya mage nayakathwaya yatathe basnahira palatha aragena yanna kamaththa pala karala thiyenawa.
nyayata ekanga bawin
bathik kalawath chithra kalawa menma bhawamaya shilpayak.
numbae suwanda mage matha nomagatuna....
ape gam palath walin bihiwunu sangitha kandayam samaga sahayogayen githa gayapu awastha mama oona tharam dakala thiyenawa...
ee wagema aayatha karana deyin rate deshiya nishpadanayata balapamak wenawa.
eheth, mawupiyan sulu wyaparikayin, idamhimi wawili karuwan ho wenath watup nowana aadayam labannannam aadayama aduwen penwa shishyathwayak laba gatha hakiya.
meka thawa dip giyoth kammali hitheyi.
ohu kiya sitiye sadharana kalayak thula mathiwaranaya pawathwimata rajaya katayuthu nokalahoth shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwe nadu pawarimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara athi bawayi.

jathika ha jathyanthara washayen mahath kalambaimakata lakwu ema siddhiye pawathina dadi sankirnathawa athulu suwishesha karunu kihipayak nisa juri sabhawak nomathi wishesha puhunu ha nithiya pilibandawa mana awabodhayak athi winisuru ma`dullak hamuwedi wibhagayak pawathwima sudusu bawa nigamanaya kala nithipathiwaraya agawinisuru janadhipathi nithignya jayantha jayasuriya mahathagen ema illima kota athayi nithipathiwarayage sambandhikarana niladharini rajaye adhinithignya nishara jayarathna menawiya pa‡∑ärakasha kalaya. 2007 wasare sita 2015 wasara dakwa rakna lanka samagame sabhapathiwaraya lesa katayuthu kala wisha‡∑äramika mejar janaral waduge palitha piyasiri pa‡∑äranandu ehi pa‡∑äradhana widhayaka niladhari lesa katayuthu kala mejar jenaral karunarathna banda adhikari egodawela, aarakshaka amathyanshaye hitapu jyeshta sahakara lekam saman disanayaka, ema naukawe kapithan yukren jathika genadi ga‡∑ärabrilow rakna lanka sabhapathiwarayeku wana wiktar samarawira ha aarakshaka amathyanshaye hitapu jyeshta sahakara lekam sujatha damayanthi jayarathna ema naduwe withthikaruwan lesa nam kirimata niyamithaya.
ethakota mala dasanayakath, kumari ekka wada karamin unne.
samaja sawi bala ganwime wadapiliwela yawathkalina karamin nawa samruddhilabhin laksha deka dakwa wadi kara dilindukama pitudakima pradhanama aramuna wenne.
eheth api parisaraya windina atharema pamini gamane aramuna itukara ganna thuru athuru margawala thanin thana randi sitiyemu.me giya gamanedi apata hamuwu suwisheshi deyak atha.

eksath jathinge wisheshagnya kandayame sancharaya saha amnasti jathyantharaya karana illim pilibandawa wimasima pinisa widesha katayuthu pilibanda niyojya widesha amathya harsha da silwa amathimata bibisi sandeshaya daru uthsahaya sarthaka nowiya.
udaharana lesa ohu sathuwa 7,7,7,5,6,4,3,3,2,2 athayi sithanna.
shri lankawei pawathi podu rajya mandaliya saukhya amathya samuluwei di prakasha kala kolambaa prakashanaya da mema samuluwata idiripath kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.
"nathikaragaththa" eeka katuka wachanayak
eyata eranga paminiyeya.

thaththa miyagos kalayak gathawu pasuwa uwada game ayata thaththa thamath mathakaya, ammath mamath nangith thaththage maha gedarata giya sama witakama thaththage mithuran asalwasiyan ha rakiya sthanaye aya pamina apa ha kathakara ape suwaduk wimasa yama puruddak karagena sitiyi.
71 eke gon karallak gahala kelo gaththa neda kiyala ahanakota karalle gon kan gana nokiya un kiyanne sirimage aanduwen karapu dewal ganaya.
me sanyuthka thatiya elidakwana dina pujya mahacharya pathegama gnyanissara swamin wahanseth, kathikacharya anuradha sudammika mehenin wahanseth mehi deshana dekak pawathwanawa.

ada kehel kotuwe chuti mahaththaya katha malawe thawath kathawak kalekata passe!me inne jayasiri ayya !ada mamakiyanna yanne chuti mahaththayage gewal gawa hitiya chali mudalalige waththe wadakarapu jayasiri ayya gana pod kathandarayak!jayasiri ayya gana katha karanawanan kiyanna de bohomayijayasiri ayya wilbat mamage putha.
11 shri lanka saukhya kshethraye abhiyoga
obe danumen nowunath, mulashra asuren ho mewani itha watina, harawath, lipiyak idiripath kirima sabandiwa obata athishayin sthuthiwantha wenawa.

mahindala aanduwe agamathi samaga dil gasamin, adhikarana katayuthu sadaha upakramashili ugul atawamin, kalaya maramin yalith samajagatha‚Äâwi hora namaya makagena balaya laba gannata uthsaha daramin innawa.
paniwuda yawamin thamanwa bera ganna lesa illa sitimayi.
giradurukotte ulhitiya rathkida jalaye wandoratu 7ma wiwruthawa pawathinawa.
mema pasale daruwan panthi kamara nomathiwa adhyapanaya labana asiru thaththwaya pilibandawa wayambaa palath pradhana amathya dharmasiri dasanayaka mahathagen kala wimasimedi pawasa sitiye mewannaki.
botath jaya wewa !

thawaduratath, eya bandi aththe yuda wirodhi, aandu wirodhi saha samajawadi adahas wetha pulul mahajanathawata prawishtawima awahira kirimata antharjala waranaya panawime eja aanduwa saha pradhana thakshanika sangathawala dhawanayath samagaya.
ratha wahana dada pathrikawa wenasweyi ‚Äì aluth eka sudanam!
eya dumriya madiriyak thula mudranaya kala lowa ekama puwathpatha wiya.

kese wethath mema chithrapataye darshana bohomayak nirmanaya karana ladde parighanaka grafik bhawithayeni.kwontach of soles chithrapataye sangitha adhyaksha dewid aanold wenuwata adhyakshaka sam mendas wisin sangitha nirmanaya pawaranu labuwe thomas niwman wethayi.
mamagin daththa sewawan wala gunathmaka bawa wagema eka eka pudagalayata labena wegaya pawa palanaya karanna puluwan.
tikak nidahase innawa me dinawala.ee kiyanne dan honda nirmana bihiwenawa aduyida?na.
skole yana kale athi wana aadarayen 90%tama passe ithuru wenne hithata wedana genadena sundara mathakayan tikak wtharayi ...
man hadissiye marunoth oya mokada karanne...?
api wishwasa karanawa ema mahathwarunge yojana adahas salakillata gena meya thawath pulul kala haki wewi kiyala.

sha ya de eyasabanasabata sha kadadanaa ‡∑äradamaba ‡∑êdarahaayaruga shaba hadamara chraeha bada daba daeyara eyba hadamaga eemae mabaderaemabe‡∑êkaha hadama yda daba charadaikapaga ee‡∑êjmia hadama yda kadie ‡∑êkajaesadabi.

ithin ee pambaayage rawatillen mata midenna puluwan wuna.
aththajjhasa deshana nam budurajanan wahanse wisin anunge aaradhanawakin thorawa thaman wahansegema adahasata anuwa deshana karanu labana dharma kottasaya yi.
"mahajanayata ahumkan dena, mahajana prashna therena kandayamak me sthanawalata pathwiya yuthumayi."
namuth api ehidi owunta , owun deshadrohi nowana bawath me samaja kramayaka wenasak pamanak bawath pahadili karanna nitharama siduwuna.
adupadu gana kiyanta kiyala thiyenawane...
asala siti mage hondama mithuriya inata ath deka thiyagena, thushnimbhuthawa apa dedena desama maruwen maruwata balayi."mokadda ane ee kiwwe?"
chandimal kandayamata enne sangakkarage nayakathwaya yatathe.
meka honda aarambhayak digatama widyathmaka lipith tika tika liyanna..widyawa danna minissu noliyana eka ratata abhagyayak...
ethakota ohe kawuru wageda...
dhanawadaya minisage honda ardhaya mara damanawa kiyana mithyawe samajawadin inne.
nata nata hitiyata labena deyak na.."
ehema nokara thaman athe pothak thiyagena ape pothe mese athe kiyamin thamanta oonade kiyawima sadachara sampanna na.
ee madiwata ohu tophat waligakaba aadiyenuth sarasila hitiya.
mokada me charithaya me lokaye nathi kenek gana diga harenne.

umbaata eeye kol ekak dunna welawe mata theruna umbaa dukin inna bawak.binduna katahadak thibune.mama eekayi ahuwe ayi umbaa apsat eke wage kiyala.umbaa ketiyen siddiya kiyala blog eka balapan kiwata eeye balanna welawa thibune na macho.onna dan thamayi siddiya hariyatama danagaththe.me ha patiya dakkama umbaata witharak neweyi apitath duka hithenawa ban.
katun ekanam supurudu widiyatama supiri.
othana walihoru, karam bod horu innawada, kudukarayo innawada, kar horu innawada, sil redi horu, sunami horu innawada ehema innawa nam kagahanna.
machan, umbaa punchi yogi wa witharak nemeyi apiwath amuthuma sundara chamathkarajanaka lokekata aragena giya me lipiyen.
itha mathadi nikuth wu windos wista saha ofis 2007 sinhala athuru muhunath hi bhawitha wana wachana asurin sakas kala "thorathuru thakshana paribhashika shabda malawa" apata dan loku sewayak karawi.
ma sithannata wimi..

eka ma dinaka
mul pituwa / sewawan / thakshanika ha wruththiya puhunu
awihinsawadaya buddha darshanaye ek pradhana bala kanuwaki.
anika ayata mata denna tharam mudalak aththeth nathuwa athine.bari welawath oba me naduwen paradunoth?karanna deyak naha.
ee bosath guna dakina daruwanira handa se mulu lowata watinawa.......

podu rajya mandaliya krida ulelata sahabhagi wima sandaha aprikanu ratawal kipayakin ‚Äògold kost‚Äô nagarayata pamina siti kridakayan gananawak athurudahanwa athayi ostreliyanu sanwidhayakayo pawasathi.

dahaata wani siyawase merata athiwu jathika aagamika prabodhaye pelambaawima matha janatha sewayata adi aa senanayaka parapure samajikayo eda bihiwemin pawathi nawa wyaparika panthiye shakthiyada karana kotagena ema satanwala aarthika bara darimatada swechchawenma idiripath wuha.

loka sampaththi ha loka wipaththi deka raja daruwange dharmadharma dekin wanne yayi da palakayin dharmaye pihita siti kalhi dewiyan pawa dharmishta wanne yayida buthsaranaye kiya thibe.me nisa thapas warun saha bhikshun wahansela rajawarunta anushasana karamin rajaya dharmaye pihituwimata uthsaha kalaha.
sidu wanneth natha.
ee naduwa wibhagawana nisa kamkaru usawiye naduwa thawakalikawa wasa dama thibenawa.
inpasu sapthambar masa 03 dina mema sebala dariya samaga anuradhapura galenbindunuwawa pradeshaye pihiti ohuge niwasata gos atha.
namuth mata ageyi...
eya samanya sirithaya.
wisheshayen meya therum ganime apahasuthawa thibenawa.
mathrukawa gataluwaki‚Äù	pusa
aah ow mayi dakke nane...sori wenna oona honde..
hisata sewanak kiyanne minisa sathu mulika ayithiwasikamak.
prayogika lesa niwan mage yamu.(meghiya suthraya)
mema anthima kamathi pathrawalata adala thorathuru kisiwak methek nodanna nisa eewa wiwrutha kirimen pasu eeta adala pudgalayan samaga sakachcha kara idiri kriyamarga ganna bawada aya kiya sitiyaya.
eeka ithama honda prawanathawak.
mema wayasa samanyayen dakwana aakarayata awurudu 16n nima we.
srujukonasraya thulata aliyaku piwisiye nam me lesar kirana jalayen kawarakata ho hasu weyi.
meyin kenekuta loku prayojanayak una kiyana ekath.
dan siyalu tharagakaruwan 112yi.
gnyaneta eewa wadak natha.
shariraye sampurnayen ho kotasakata pamanak athi wiya haka.
susantha kalpanawen kiyayi.
aanya aayema katha kala.
'toyi yanawa, eya toyi eke' aadi washayen.
ata wasara panthiyedi dawasak pethi bila wadi wela api thun denek iskola istoru nidagaththa.
swarna nanayakkara mahathmiya
passe ohu kiwwa "umbaa rata panala hitaya neda?"
awilla langa thibuna kadawalwalata ringuwa kadawalwalata ringala sigarat gaththa aragena polimata para ayinata wela bonna patangannawa.
bas nawathumen eliyata dana puththalama pare yana bas dan tawun eka wate yanawa.
kiyala thaththata wandina gathawa kiyala wandinawa.
jarmaniye di shishathwayata labuna mudal bohoma arapiri masmen wiyadam kale ee salasuma hithe thiyagena.
